text: Neu cac nguoi cau nguyen chung thi chung se khong nghe đuoc loi cau cua cac nguoi va neu chung co nghe đang thi chung van khong đap lai loi cau cua cac nguoi; va vao Ngay phuc sinh, chung se phu nhan viec cac nguoi 'ton tho' chung. Va khong ai co the bao cho Nguoi (Muhammad!) biet (su that) giong nhu Đang Am Tuong (Allah)
